text: Øivind Solheim (28 May 1928 - 24 July 2017)Øivind Solheim's obituary was a Norwegian ice hockey player. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1952. He was a brother of Olympian ice hockey player Leif Solheim. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo Category:Furuset Ishockey players
title: Øivind Solheim
